senses.synonym: 00086315-a ((of persons) excessively affected by emotion; \""he would become emotional over nothing at all\""; \""she was worked up about all the noise\"");00922656-a (in an aroused state);01935325-a ((of e.g. a molecule) made reactive or more reactive);02399292-a (marked by uncontrolled excitement or emotion; \""a crowd of delirious baseball fans\""; \""something frantic in their gaiety\""; \""a mad whirl of pleasure\""
